titleStmt.title: Lavves and ordinances set downe by Robert Earle of Leycester, the Queenes Maiesties Lieutenant and Captaine General of her armie and forces in the Lowe Countries: Meete and fit to be obserued by all such as shall serue her Maiestie vnder him in the said countries, and therefore to be published and notified to the whole armie.
Regulations. 1586
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Army.
Leicester, Robert Dudley, Earl of, 1532?-1588. aut

publicationStmt.publisher: By Christopher Barker, printer to the Queenes most excellent Maiestie,

notesStmt.note: This edition contains 55 articles and omits the oath.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
